name: Science (cutetiger10)
description:
Here is a new game to play, called SCIENCE! It is made completely in Python, but since I don't know how to use pygame, it is completely text based.

A few notes:

All elements must have capital letters at the beginning. (I know it's tedious; I'll change it next update.)

All actions must be made of completely lower-case letters.

If you can't figure out some combinations, here's a list:

Water: Hydrogen, bond, Oxygen

Ammonia: Hydrogen, bond, Nitrogen

Methane: Hydrogen, bond, Carbon

Carbon dioxide: Oxygen, bond, Carbon

White flame: Magnesium, burn

And with that, I hope you enjoy!
